Review Title: Great for a chill cocktail evening! Awesome happy hour selection from 5-8pm!
Review Text:
Amazing chill cocktail bar. Happy hour was 5-8pm for half price on a big range of cocktails. If you are looking for something low key and classy, then this is your place. 

Servers were very nice too and the aesthetic inside was great!
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: who would of known that a small dodgy alley way could have the best Cocktails in town! it was a  incredible experience. i definitely recommend it!😀
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Superb service and great cocktails, stumbled across the place while exploring the side streets. Well worth the detour
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 5
Review Title: Best Secret Cocktail Bar and Fabulous Staff
Review Text: The Best Secret Cocktail Bar in HCMC!!!! A must on your todo list while here. It is a converted hotel with a fabulous ambience. Friendly staff and superb drinks. Hoang, the bartender, was a joy to watch and talk with. We got a tour of the place and samples of different drinks. We miss you all!!!
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Oh this place you have to Visit !!! It’s the place to experience excellence , the staff has a calm about themselves that gives you the feeling of a comfortable environment. The menu is impeccable. The atmosphere even better. Relaxed and chill. The cocktail made by professionals and they do not disappoint you with the taste of the drinks nor the history behind them. If you want to experience the core of cocktail excellence. Come to this place !
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: The bar staff were excellent and friendly . We asked for, and they gave us, an in depth history of Vietnam, its language and places to visit ( and not visit at this time of year) in Vietnam as well as suggestions if we ever visit again. Lovely ambience and background speakeasy vibe. Fab selection of whiskeys and cocktails and a wide selection of good wines- (they do happy hours for 50% but check the times ) and non alcoholic drinks also available. Hidden away down the back of an alley nearish the Saigon centre,  ( with staff outside and along the alley to guide us - it was perfectly safe anyway) we found this hidden treasure. Food menu looks excellent though we came late to the bar so did not eat. Barman has excellent English and one of the bar girls, though a little shy, soon got chatting. There is live music on Friday and Saturday early evening too! What a little jewel to find! Tad more expensive than local bars as mostly imported but the choice and quality on offer was good.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Title: Some of the best cocktails we’ve had!
Review Text: There is no way we would have found this place without looking on here and reading other people’s instructions - thank you. We would agree, some of the best cocktails we have ever had! Cocktails are beautifully garnished and every well made, the many is vast and the inside very well styled, in keeping with its hidden location. What a great find!
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Great ambiance and cool place to enjoy . The service was on time. Stuarts were humble and cheerful. Food was excellent and quality.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Title: Excellent Cocktail Bar in hidden location at the centre of HCMC
Review Text: You won’t find this bar by accident, but it is well worth looking for. They offer classic and signature cocktails expertly mixed by a friendly barman. It’s a sophisticated classic bar and plays gentle jazz rather than pop music. We enjoyed the tapas snacks which are freshly prepared to order. Apparently it used to be busy every night before COVID but now it’s quiet on weekdays especially before 8pm when they have half price happy hours. They also have a great selection of spirits from around the world.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Hidden down a little alley but well worth a visit…The best cocktails and if you are there for happy hour certain cocktails are half price
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: We had the best time. B was the best bar tender. The best cocktails in Saigon. Love the atmosphere and ambiance.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text:
Down a narrow alley behind black curtains lies this gorgeous cocktail bar.
We had four great cocktails which were very reasonably priced including the Mekong Delta featuring a huge ice cube and two others which were set on fire before drinking.
Atmosphere was great and service perfect, we had 8 oysters which were huge, delicious and very cheap at $2.50 each.
Cocktails ranged from $10-$13.
Some of the best cocktails we’ve ever had!
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Can easily miss this place down a small alley. Well worth the effort. The bar staff definitely know their stuff. Expertly crafted cocktails which look and taste stunning. Not at all pretentious, all the staff very welcoming and friendly even offering to adjust cocktails if they weren’t to our taste. This was never necessary! Many cocktails and some food and wine at half price between 5 and 8 so pays to go early. Quiet jazz played, with live music later on.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Little hidden bar in saigon, so excited when you go into little alley to come and behind the door is nice place with cool drink, decorated in coconut 🥥
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Title: Quán bar ngon nhất HCM / Sài Gòn
Review Text:
Thanh Gin nhỏ ẩn này là tuyệt vời.
Nhân viên tuyệt vời, đồ uống tuyệt vời, bầu không khí tuyệt vời và ban nhạc tuyệt vời
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text:
Vi besøgte baren en onsdag aften omkring spisetid og havde en god oplevelse. 

Stedet er forholdsvis lille og trendy og man bliver lukket ind bag sorte gardiner. 

Både drinks og mad levede op til vores forventninger.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text:
Amazing cocktails in a very cool bar. The barkeeper was super nice and funny and until 8pm the classic cocktails are 50% off (85,000 VND). Sadly this is only for cocktails such as margarita and manhattan etc., not the Vietnamese influenced special cocktails, but great for an after work drink. The sweet potato chips are great. Later in the evening they have live music. 

The bar is a bit difficult to find tho. Walk along Pasteur street and behind the Vera massage there is a small alley that you have to follow until the end, past the old compass. At the end is an old man who will open an inconspicuous door and voilà, enter the world is The Alley! Enjoy your drink!
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: Cocktails on point, vibe was 100, and the live music in the evening was so good!! When we went it was live, acoustic hits. It's popular, but not so crowded someone is bumping into your seat while you're having a good time.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text:
Loistava cocktail baari!
Hyvä palvelu! Tunnelma loistava! ”Sala kapakka”. Happy hour 5pm-8pm. Suosittelen!
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: This is a great gem  hidden down an alley just behind the Rex. The ambiance is fantastic, with some live music playing in a corner and packed with young locals and tourists. The cocktails selection was excellent and the prices reasonable. The bartenders are artists at their craft. This is definitely a must visit.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Title: Probably the best bar in Nam
Review Text:
Probably the best bar in Nam bar non!
It’s small and it’s up an alley next to the Liberty City point hotel and I admit the location looks like you might encounter the worst but it fine and a real find of a place. Great bar , great cocktails and great showmen on the bar and very much like a GI bar from 1968. If you go to any bar go to here !
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Title: Dold pärla i Ho Chi Minh city!
Review Text: Mysig trendig bar. Kunde ha varit i London eller en annan storstad i världen. Helt dold i en gränd som ingen skulle hitta till utan någon referens som tripadvisor eller någon som varit där som du känner. Bli inte orolig när ni möts av en lokal man i gränden som frågar om ni letar efter baren och visar er in i en dörr dold bakom svarta gardiner. Härlig luftkonditionering i den tropiska natten. Den bästa Mojito sen vår vistelse på Holbox  island i Mexico. Suverän bartender som vet vad han gör och har definitivt varit utanför Vietnam.  Rekommenderas varmt om ni besöker denna stad.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 4
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 3
Review Text:
Slightly hidden from the road (though not too difficult to find at all, really) but very much worth searching for. One of the few bars where the bartenders can prepare a decent Sazerac right off the bat. Pretty small and intimate, and great fun once the band comes on. The only problem is losing track of how much you’ve drunk...

Great cocktail bar, and one I would revisit in a heartbeat whenever I’m back in Saigon.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Title: Mình bỡ ngỡ khi bước vài quán
Review Text: Mình bỡ ngỡ khi bước vài quán là 1 không gian khoáng đãng, hoà tiếng nhạc du dương. Là 1 nơi phù hợp với mọi lứa tuổi, đặc biệt thức uống là ngon cực, nhân viên lại thân thiên vui vẻ.....
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen

Review Text: This is a hidden bar from the street. Lost at the main street but finally I found this hidden gem. Quiet noisy and busy bar but the music was so good. especially the blind pianist took my heart. His playing is outstanding. I enjoyed the music a lot and would like to visit again. The waiter can speak English very fluently and was friendly. Appreciated with his help :) The drink he recommended was perfect.
Location: Nhà Hàng The Alley Cocktail Bar & Kitchen
